Committed to the idea of life-long learning, I am passionate about web development and the endless possibilities it offers. I am always seeking out new challenges and opportunities to grow as a developer.

Whether working on a personal project or collaborating with a team, I am committed to delivering high-quality and scalable web applications that meet the needs of users and businesses.

Weather App

Input your location to get the next 3 days weather overview or today's hourly weather, as well as the feels like temperature, humidity, chance of rain, and wind speed in fahrenheit or celcius.
